title: Theresa May – 2018 Speech at NHS 70 Reception
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the speech made by Theresa May, the Prime Minister, at a reception on 4 July 2018 to mark the 70th anniversary of the NHS.

[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/theresamay-1.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/theresamay-1.jpg)
